181 template<class VECTOR = ::Vector<double> >
182 class PrimitiveVectorMemory : public VectorMemory<VECTOR>
183 {
184 public:
188  PrimitiveVectorMemory () {}
189 
206  virtual VECTOR *alloc ()
207  {
208  return new VECTOR();
209  }
210 
223  virtual void free (const VECTOR *const v)
224  {

415 /* --------------------- inline functions ---------------------- */
416 
417 
418 template <typename VECTOR>
419 inline
420 VectorMemory<VECTOR>::Pointer::Pointer(VectorMemory<VECTOR> &mem)
421  :
422  pool(&mem, typeid(*this).name()), v(0)
423 {
424  v = pool->alloc();
425 }
426 
427 
428 template <typename VECTOR>
429 inline
430 VectorMemory<VECTOR>::Pointer::~Pointer()
431 {
432  pool->free(v);
433 }
434 
435 
436 template <typename VECTOR>
437 inline
438 VectorMemory<VECTOR>::Pointer::operator VECTOR *() const
439 {
440  return v;
441 }
442 
443 
444 template <typename VECTOR>
445 inline
446 VECTOR &VectorMemory<VECTOR>::Pointer::operator * () const
447 {
448  return *v;
449 }
450 
451 
452 template <typename VECTOR>
453 inline
454 VECTOR *VectorMemory<VECTOR>::Pointer::operator -> () const
455 {
456  return v;
457 }
